dc:title: Letters: From the City to Us. From Us to the City
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: When the city says it will use interest money they returned to acquire more property, she responds by asking that they give it to WNYC radio "which provides such joy to so many." (See Doc #775)
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 776 1960-11-04 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
